Sentence.value: Studies have shown that adults who drink light to moderate amounts of alcohol may be less likely to develop heart disease than those who do not drink at all or are heavy drinkers.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Studies have shown that [[adults|C0001675]] who drink light to moderate amounts of alcohol may be less likely to develop [[heart disease|C0018799]] than those who do not drink at all or are heavy drinkers.
